extendedInfo.description: Download the worldâs first app dedicated to helping you crack creative briefs.Browse through a multitude of creative brief cracking techniques; view numerous examples of inspirational creative and flick through insightful tips written by award winning creatives.Key Featuresâ¢ 20 creative brief cracking techniques.â¢ 60 examples of some of the best creative from around the world.â¢ 22 insightful tips written by award winning creatives.â¢ No internet connection required.â¢ Works on all Android devices.

reviews.title: A solid checklist of approaches.
reviews.comment: A good list of ways to look at the brief but not much else. And without updates, it barely qualifies as an app. Not really worth the price,useful nevertheless.
reviews.author: A Google User
